item.description:
SunDo Yin Acu-Circle

Yin Acu-Circle is an acupuncture-enhanced SunDo-Taoist meditation circle. Enjoy an evening of deep relaxation, as you experience healing of the mind, body and spirit. First, you will receive an ear acupuncture treatment to relieve stress, promote relaxation, and prevent insomnia. Rest comfortably as the needles are put in place while meditating and breathing deeply.

Taoist breathing meditation enhanced by ear acupuncture can result in more relaxed breathing, increased Qi circulation and subtle healing of the mind and body. Regardless of your physical fitness level, beginners are welcome to sample SunDo practice in this special event. Please wear loose comfortable clothing. Yoga mats and water bottles are not necessary.

Space is limited so please RSVP to secure a spot!

The Benefits of Auriculotherapy (Ear Acupuncture)

Sunday, November 14, 2010
3 pm to 4:30 pm
$20 per person

SunDo Mountain Taoist Center
45 South Main Street, Suite 90
West Hartford, CT 06017
(860) 523-5260

www.sundo.org

www.EZacupuncture.com


Embracing Yin Energy

The universe is comprised of opposite yet complementary forces of Yin and Yang. Yang represents heat and is associated with fire, sun, daytime and masculinity. Yin, by contrast, represents cold and is associated with water, moon, nighttime and femininity. Balance of Yin and Yang is essential for achieving health and wellness. Take a break from the hectic pace of daily living to restore your Yin.

SunDo Taoist Yoga accesses the deep Yin tissues of the body, as well as the more superficial yang tissues of muscles and skin. Through rhythmic breathing, meditation and gentle postures, SunDo opens up the body to allow vital energy to flow into the deeper Yin areas.

Join us in sharing energy and entering into a healing journey together.
item.name: Yin Acu-Circle
